item.title: EP 36 - It's Leningrad, You Fool!
item.itunes:title: It's Leningrad, You Fool!
item.description:
Sorry for the weird "Leningrad" insert. I packed everything up and went to the cool, cool library to edit this when I realized my mistake. No professional mic? No problem. I just said "Leningrad" several times out loud in an otherwise quiet library. And now I'm on a watch list!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Today we look at Colgate forts, missing Russian gold, and the dangers of ghost hunting.

"Colgate forts" is a phrase you've probably never heard. I certainly hadn't before I started this show. But the rumor is that Russian soldiers, fleeing the Communist takeover, stole all the nation's gold and then hid out in houses made of toothpaste. Only half of that sentence is actually true.

Then we travel to Seattle, where a young man and his friends were spending their free time hunting ghosts. But after the gunshots rang out, the only hunt that matter was the one for the killers.

Links:

Ever hear of the Colgate forts?

https://archive.4plebs.org/pol/thread/120678109/

Where in Siberia is the last Tsar of Russia's 'missing' gold?

http://siberiantimes.com/other/others/features/where-in-siberia-is-the-last-tsar-of-russias-missing-gold/

Secret stash of tsar's gold worth billions found in old rail tunnel near Lake Baikal

https://siberiantimes.com/other/others/news/secret-stash-of-tsars-gold-worth-billions-found-in-old-rail-tunnel-near-lake-baikal/

Leningrad: Siege and Symphony: The Story of the Great City Terrorized by Stalin, Starved by Hitler, Immortalized by Shostakovich

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00JLQ4O60/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00JLQ4O60&linkCode=as2&tag=videvand-20&linkId=e2a99099bf4a2bce1e74d60814b3e223

17-Year-Old Ryan Dela Cruz Was Fatally Shot While Ghost-Hunting in a Seattle Park

https://www.teenvogue.com/story/17-year-old-ryan-dela-cruz-fatally-shot-ghost-hunting-seattle-park

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
